name: BunnyInAHurry
description:
Control a cute little bunny while its day slowly turns into hell...

Get to safety before you bleed out.

A/D for movement

Space to jump

Point and click to bleed everywhere. It may give you a boost, but sure isn't healthy!

Oh right alt+f4 to quit. Sorry.

All art made by: Diana Berg & Jeppe Kjærsgaard Nielsen

Programmers: Till Balbach, Patrik Bertilsson, Andreas Hennig, Christian Johannesen, Thorbjørn Serritslev Nielsen
